reviews.author: Shakeel Butt
reviews.summary: Shakeel Butt suggested that the MM subsystem needs more reviewers and proposed borrowing a script from netdev and bpf to track development statistics.

reviews.author: SeongJae Park
reviews.summary: Reviewer SeongJae Park raised a question about the review status for DAMON patches and mentioned that they have been working on a tool to provide detailed review status information, including for specific subsystems.
